hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from User user where 1 = 1 and ( lower(user.loginName) like '%${loginName?lower_case}%' or lower(user.userName) like '%${userName?lower_case}%' or exists ( select entityUuid from Pinyin pinyin where pinyin.entityUuid = user.uuid and pinyin.type = 'User' and lower(pinyin.pinyin) like '${pinyin?lower_case}%' ) ) order by code asc,userName
